source:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
The fretful Arkasodara seeks someone to brave the wilderness.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
パーラカの里にいるアルカソーダラ族の娘は、心配そうにしている。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_TODO_00<tab>Search for the wizened Arkasodara to the north of Palaka's Stand.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_TODO_00<tab>アルカソーダラ族の男性を探す
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_TODO_01<tab>アルカソーダラ族の男性と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the fish to the wizened Arkasodara.
target: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_TODO_03<tab>アルカソーダラ族の男性に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E910F01 /var>を渡す
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_TODO_04<tab>アルカソーダラ族の娘に報告

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_000<tab>I've heard about all the good you've done for our village, and we're all thankful for it. I hate to impose upon your generosity further, but if you have a moment to spare, could you lend me your stout arm?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_000あなたは、里への救援で来てくださった方ですよね……。
ひとつ、頼みを聞いてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_001<tab>I would ask you to search for my father. I haven't seen him for bells, and after asking around it seems he may have left the village and ventured north.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_001父を、捜していただきたいんです。
姿が見えなくて、住民に尋ねてまわったところ、
ひとりで里を出て、北の方へ向かったようで……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_002<tab>The divinities only know why he went alone, but if I were to follow him I'd likely end up at the bottom of some beast's belly within a malm. Please, find him and return him safely to our home.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_002戦う術のない私には、森を歩くことも叶いません。
どうか、「トラーナ関門」へ向かった父を、
連れ戻してください……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_003<tab>Please, bring my father back. He's even less of a fighter than I am!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_003どうか、「トラーナ関門」へ向かった父を、
連れ戻してください……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_005<tab>Oh, thank the heavens! I had resigned myself to becoming food for those dreadful things!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_005いやぁ、すまない……。
君が通りがかって、助かったよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_006<tab>What's that? My daughter sent you to find me? I thought no one saw me leave the village, but I suppose I am not so sly as I thought. And now I've caused her, and you, no end of worry.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_006娘に頼まれて、捜しにきてくれたのかい？
こっそり出てきたつもりが、バレていたか……
君にも、娘にも、申し訳ないことをしてしまったね。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_007<tab>The number of people fleeing to our village increases by the day, and although I would never begrudge them protection, it does put a strain on our food supplies. I took up my old fishing equipment hoping I could make some small contribution.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_007最近、パーラカの里には避難民が多く来ているから、
食料不足に陥るんじゃないかと、気がかりだったんだ。
それで、できることはないかと考えて、魚でも獲ろうかと……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_008<tab>Children need hearty meals to grow, after all. Filling our stores is the least I can do to ease us through these troubled times. Think you could help this old fool on his errand?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_008食べ盛りの子供も避難してきているし、
どうにか、新鮮な魚を持ち帰ってやりたいんだ。
手間をかけさせるが、少し手伝ってもらえないかな……？

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_009<tab>Your generosity is much appreciated. I've already set up several cages near the water. All you have to do is check them and bring me anything they've caught.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_009ああ、本当にありがたい。
川の中に「」を設置してある。
それを2つほど回収してきてもらえると、助かるよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_010<tab>I've set up cages around the river. See if they've caught anything, and if so, bring it here.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_010川の中に「」を設置してある。
それを回収してきてもらえると、助かるよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_015<tab>I trust the river wasn't too cold for you. So, what'd you find? I hope my fishing skills haven't gone rusty in my old age.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_015手伝ってくれて、ありがとう。
「」は回収できたかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_016<tab>Ah, that's what I like to see. Plump and juicy, just what we need. This'll keep the refugees fed for another day, I reckon.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_016……よかった、魚も獲れているみたいだ。
これだけあれば、1日くらいはしのげるだろう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_017<tab>And that's how we have to get through this: one day at a time. All right, let's return to my daughter. I'm sure she's had her fill of worry on my account.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSB04264_000_017おかげで、少しは里に貢献できそうだよ。
それじゃあ、心配している娘のもとへ戻るとしよう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_020<tab>I've been waiting for you! My father returned and told me about all you did for him and for our village. It seems I owe you thanks for two good deeds today.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_020おかえりなさい！
先ほど、戻った父から話は聞いています。
魚の件といい、本当になんとお礼をしたらよいか……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_021<tab>Palaka's Stand has long been a place where the stewards of the shrines and tombs resided. That's to say, we've been focused mainly on meeting the needs of the departed, not the living.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_021パーラカの里は本来、この近辺にある数々の神殿や、
墳墓を護るための、守護者たちが住まう場所。
避難民を支える蓄えがないのは、事実です。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_022<tab>As such, I understand my father's desire to see our food stores bolstered, but if he gets himself killed, we'll all be worse off for it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_022ですので、食料不足が深刻化する前にと、
父が行動に出た気持ちは、私にもわかるのですが……
そうは言っても、死んでしまっては元も子もありません。

source: TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_023<tab>Thankfully, we needn't worry about that. For today, at least. Take this as a gesture of gratitude from both Father and I.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZF009_04264_RESIDENTSA04264_000_023あなたのおかげで、本当に助かりました。
どうか、これをお持ちください。
父と私からのお礼です。
